title: If there is no data for series, it should pop up a friendly error message to remind.
OB: When creating a chart and selecting a column without data, no error message is displayed.
EB: When there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should pop up to remind the user.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Create a chart and set the data definition. 2. Select a column without data. 3. Confirm that no error message is displayed.
